column5: Heading up to mahkwa area 6/22. Wondering if anyone has been up there yet? How they did? Or if your heading up there and can put up a report before I go that would great! Can't wait!
The best info on the south central basin is the weekly fishing report from Mike Willems of SWWL.http://www.sww-lodge.com/category/fishing-report/

Thanks for the suggestion. I've been following swwl for the last couple of years now. I look forward to reading there reports every week. Noticed on Monday that they posted there first report. I know I've talked to guys here in years past that fish out of mahkwa... Just wondering if any have been there. Swwl is a bit to the west of where we fish but have seen there guides in bray a few times.
We don't head up there until mid-July. So not much help on fishing reports before you go. Would be interested in your report when you get back though.
